titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify the assessment and collection of the excise tax arrows.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/9/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code by including in the excise tax on bows and arrows any shaft, point, nock, or vane used in the manufacture of an arrow.
